mapper.select: select a.OwnerID a.OwnerPwd, a.OwnerName, a.Sex, a.OwnerTel, a.EnterTime, a.EndTime, h.HouseAddress from OwnerInfo as a where a.OwnerID = #{OwnerID}
mapper.insert: insert into OwnerInfo (OwnerID, OwnerPwd, OwnerName, Sex, OwnerTel, EnterTime, EndTime, ResideMode) values (#{OwnerID}, #{OwnerPwd}, #{OwnerName}, #{Sex}, #{OwnerTel}, #{EnterTime}, #{EndTime}, #{ResideMode})
insert into HouseInfo (HouseID, OwnerID, HouseAddress, HouseArea) values (#{HouseID}, #{OwnerID}, #{HouseAddress}, #{HouseArea})
mapper.update: update OwnerInfo set OwnerPwd=#{OwnerPwd}, OwnerName=#{OwnerName}, Sex=#{Sex}, OwnerTel=#{OwnerTel}, EnterTime=#{EnterTime}, EndTime=#{EndTime} where OwnerID = #{OwnerID}
mapper.select: select o.* from OwnerInfo o left join HouseInfo h on h.OwnerID = o.OwnerID WHERE h.HouseAddress = #{HouseAddress}
